gameLogic

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    ShoppingCart is a class that keeps track of what the merch player wants to buy and the cost of it. Last modified: 3-05-2020 Created: 2-05-2020
    Author:
    Kenn Leen Duenas Fulgencio

        public void addToCart(Merchandise merch,
                      int amount)
        Parameters:
        merch - an instance of Merchandise. It could be a Crop, Item or Animal.
        amount - cost of the merchandise player has added to the Cart.

      • removeFromCart

        public void removeFromCart(Merchandise merch)
        Removes the merch from arraylist and the merch's price from totalCost
        Parameters:
        merch - A crop, item or Animal the player has removed from cart.

      • clearCart

        public void clearCart()
        Removes everything from the cart list.

      • getCart

      • setM_cart

        Parameters:

      • getTotalCost

        public int getTotalCost()
        Returns:
        total cost of everything in cart

      • setTotalCost

        public void setTotalCost(int totalCost)
        Parameters:
        totalCost - the new calculated price for everything in cart.
